segments.text: George , I heard our eighth generation computer is appreciated by the guests . They intend to sign contract with our company . You have done a good job . We are so proud of you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I never imagine that would happen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hah , as the sales department director , you are the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . But I am not sure whether the manager is settling for it . She asked me to go to her office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? You've done so well for the company . She should give you a prize .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel nervous when I face Nova .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! What are you nervous about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know the sales figure shows that the prediction has not achieved .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But the sales number is close to the predicted amount .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm still nervous . I don't know what to say to the manager . I always feel ill in that kind of place .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take it easy . Be confident of yourself . I'm sure you can do it .
segments.speaker: S1
